1.0.name: wordpress/post-and-page-excerpt-widgets
1.0.description:
Creates widgets that display excerpts from posts or pages in the sidebar. You may use 'more' links and/or link the widget title to the post or page. Requires Page Excerpt or Excerpt Editor for page excerpts. Supports the_excerpt Reloaded and Advanced Excerpt.

Versions 2.0 and up require WordPress 2.8. If you are using WordPress 2.3 through 2.7.1, you should use version 1.2 of this plugin instead.
